data.eml:eml: The Neotropical sharpshooter genus Ruppeliana Young (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae): four new species, key to males, and new synonyms

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mejdalani, Gabriel (2017): The Neotropical sharpshooter genus Ruppeliana Young (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae): four new species, key to males, and new synonyms. Zootaxa 4329 (5): 436-448, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4329.5.2
